name: Tivoli Lisboa

reviews.text: As a young couple travelling through Europe, budget was always on our mind - and we got a very decent room at the Tivoli for a reasonable price.
reviews.title: Good value for where it is

reviews.text: The service was formal and helpful, the room clean and comfortable, and Lisbon was beautiful.
reviews.title: Loved the service
Really Good
reviews.text: Our only suggestion to anyone looking to stay here would be to be aware of the distance you'll be walking to the main hub of Lisbon. The hotel is at the top of the (mainly steep) main street that runs right through the heart of the city, so you'll be walking for a good 15 minutes to get where you want to be. Alternatively there's a Metro stop right outside the hotel (on the other side of the block), which we'd definitely recommend.

My wife and I stayed at this hotel during the off-season of November 10-15. We stayed in the Tivoli Suite located on the 8th floor. The suite was pretty impressive and very roomy. The service was excellent all around. The food was 5 star all the way but very, very expensive. There are 2 restaurants within this hotel 1 on the lobby and 1 on the top floor. The restaurant on the top floor is spectacular with an amazing view but make sure you have a few hundred euros if you want to eat there.
reviews.title: Great Info you need to know
Good but not international 5 star.
reviews.text: Stayed at the hotel during April 2006 for three nights. It was the first hotel I have stayed in that did not take a credit card imprint - although the booking had been paid for in advance. We were just asked on check out about our use of the mini bar - which was as expensive as mini bars are! Staff were very helpful and polite.

description: Located in the heart of Lisbon, this is an elegant 5 star hotel. Renowned for its business meeting facilities for top executives, Tivoli Lisboa continues the tradition of being a well known meeting point in the city. A weekend in this hotel means you can enjoy our swimming pool, a drink in the privacy of our bars and relax meal in one of our 2 restaurantes, Terraço with a unique view and Brasserie Flo Lisbon.
